valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Wed 29 Oct 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Thu 30 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: Lows Rockall 985, and FitzRoy 1004 losing their identities by midnight tonight. Atlantic low 969 expected 300 miles west of Shannon by same time
